channel.title: How do I change the buying methods?
channel.description: I think thats the problem with ChassyScape. (The glitch where you can only buy 1 thing at a time from a shop, even if you click on 'Buy 5, 10, or X') The buying methods are probably screwed, does anyone know how to change them or where to change them? Thanks.

item.title: How do I change the buying methods?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

I think thats the problem with ChassyScape. (The glitch where you can only buy 1 thing at a time from a shop, even if you click on ‘Buy 5, 10, or X’) The buying methods are probably screwed, does anyone know how to change them or where to change them?
Thanks.
